cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent

Class BaseAgentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.BaseAgentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentController, ConfigurationChangeListener, Controllable

    public abstract class BaseAgentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controllable, AgentController, ConfigurationChangeListener
    Abstract class that implements some of the methods that can be used by sample Controller. Also unregisters logger for root class of registered bot. Defines and handles hero id and creates hero information. Implemented methods are for example Attack, MoveTo, GrabAll, CastASpell
    Author:
    Banzindun

      • updateHero

        public void updateHero(Hero h)
        Description copied from interface: AgentController
        Updates our hero. We want to keep the reference pointing at the same object, so that controllers etc. don't need to ask for a hero reference every tick.
        Specified by:
        updateHero in interface AgentController
        Parameters:
        h - Hero with id that corresponds to our hero.

      • moveTo

        public AgentCommand moveTo(Location l)
        This is a command, that can be used by any controller to move to some location. This will be extended by BaseagentController.
        Parameters:
        l - Location where we want to move. The location can have id or x, y set in it. If only id is set, we will move to entity with that id. If only location is set, we will move to that location.
        Returns:
        Returns agentCommand, that moves the agent to given location.

      • pickupRune

        public AgentCommand pickupRune(Rune b)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to pickup a rune.
        Parameters:
        b - The rune.
        Returns:
        Returns command to come closer to rune or to pick it up if standing too close.

      • useShrine

        public AgentCommand useShrine(Healer h)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to use a shrine.
        Parameters:
        h - The shrine (healer).
        Returns:
        Returns command to come closer to shrine or to use it, if very close.

      • buy

        public AgentCommand buy(java.lang.String item)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to buy a item given by its name.
        Parameters:
        item - Name of the item to buy.
        Returns:
        Returns command to buy a specified item.

      • sell

        public AgentCommand sell(int slot)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to sell a item on given slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot that contains the item that should be sold.
        Returns:
        Returns command that sells item on given slot.

      • sell

        public AgentCommand sell(java.lang.String itemName)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to sell item, given its name. The item is found using the name.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Name of the item to be sold.
        Returns:
        Returns command that sells the item with specified name.

      • castASpell

        public AgentCommand castASpell(Location l,
                               int index)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command that casts a spell at index at given location.
        Parameters:
        l - Location with id or x, y coordinates. If only id given, the spell will be cast on target with given id. Else the spell will be cast on given location, if it is not a passive spell.
        index - Index of the spell.
        Returns:
        Returns a command to cast a spell (by index) to given location.

      • attack

        public AgentCommand attack(Location e)
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to attack a entity.
        Parameters:
        e - Location, that has an id set.
        Returns:
        Returns a command to attack a entity with given id.

      • grabAll

        public AgentCommand grabAll()
        This is a command that can be used by extending controller to issue a command to grab all items. This should be called if you are close to the base shop.
        Returns:
        Returns command to grab all items from stash at the base shop.
